name: Jí Xiàn Zhēn Tàn
summary: This game showcases the unique culture of Tianjin, inspired by the iconic ‘Auntie with a bun’ and the detectives often seen on tricycle ads. Featuring authentic voice acting by a real Tianjin auntie, the game highlights local traditions, dialects, and a lighthearted, joyful outlook on life, offering players a taste of Tianjin’s distinctive charm.
